long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plugin Name: Content Operations AI Suite

Description:
Simplify and supercharge your content operations with our powerful AI-driven plugin. The Content Operations AI Suite brings the intelligence of six specialized agents right into your workflow, making it easier than ever to create, optimize, and manage content.

Key Features:
SEO Agent: Optimize titles, meta descriptions, schemas, and keywords for maximum search visibility.
Redaction Agent: Ensure content quality and compliance by checking articles against your editorial guidelines.
Research Agent: Transform raw data, URLs, and files into polished, SEO-optimized articles with ease.
Discovery Agent: Find trending topics and create drafts tailored to your content persona from specific sources.
Social Agent: Craft and schedule engaging social media captions for seamless content distribution.
This plugin is your all-in-one solution for increasing productivity, enhancing content quality, and streamlining the content creation lifecycle.

Get started today and revolutionize the way you manage content with AI!

Note: Requires an active Bridged Media subscription for full functionality.
